mapper.select: SELECT team_id AS teamId, user_id AS userId, team_name AS teamName, sport_type AS sportType, description, max_members AS maxMembers, current_members AS currentMembers, location, meeting_date AS meetingDate, map_image_url AS mapImageUrl, created_at AS createdAt FROM teams
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teams (user_id, team_name, sport_type, description, max_members, current_members, location, meeting_date, map_image_url, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{teamName}, #{sportType}, #{description}, #{maxMembers}, 0, #{location}, #{meetingDate}, #{mapImageUrl}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT team_id AS teamId, user_id AS userId, team_name AS teamName, sport_type AS sportType, description, max_members AS maxMembers, current_members AS currentMembers, location, meeting_date AS meetingDate, map_image_url AS mapImageUrl, created_at AS createdAt FROM teams ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT team_id AS teamId, user_id AS userId, team_name AS teamName, sport_type AS sportType, description, max_members AS maxMembers, current_members AS currentMembers, location, meeting_date AS meetingDate, map_image_url AS mapImageUrl, created_at AS createdAt FROM teams WHERE team_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE teams SET team_name = #{teamName}, sport_type = #{sportType}, description = #{description}, max_members = #{maxMembers}, location = #{location}, meeting_date = #{meetingDate}, map_image_url = #{mapImageUrl} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id AS teamId, t.team_name AS teamName, t.sport_type AS sportType, t.description, t.max_members AS maxMembers, t.current_members AS currentMembers, t.location, t.meeting_date AS meetingDate, t.map_image_url AS mapImageUrl, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM teams t JOIN team_members tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id WHERE tm.user_id = #{userId};
